pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, May 6, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Science and Sport Kirsty Duncan will participate in the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada Roundtable on Research Excellence to recognize some of Canada’s top researchers.

Closed to media.

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Commissioner of Official Languages Raymond Théberge.

Closed to media.
